name: Polo Sweater with Trim
description: Polo Sweater with Trim - Premium product line, soft wool material, classic design with delicate trim detailing. Various sizes from S to XXL, suitable for many body types. Currently available in grey-brown.

name: Wool Polo Shirt
description: The wool polo shirt belongs to the high-end Senora product line, made from premium wool material, with a slim fit design, long sleeves, stand-up collar, plain pattern, and regular length. The product needs careful maintenance, dry clean only to maintain durability and long-lasting shape.

name: Knitted Cardigan
description: High-end knitted cardigan, wool material, turtleneck, long sleeves, loose-fitting style, regular length, plain pattern.

description: Made from soft, stretchy, and highly elastic knit fabric. Long-sleeve design with a high collar and zipper detail that serves both as a decorative accent and warmth retention. Regular fit style comfortable and suitable for Vietnamese body types.

name: Long-sleeve polo shirt
description: Regular fit long-sleeve Polo shirt with collar and 3 buttons. Straight fit with elastic cuffs. Soft and breathable knit fabric provides absolute comfort. Metagent logo printed on right chest.

name: Super Light Padded Jacket
description: Super light padded jacket, made from Polyester material, cotton padded for warmth, loose fit, high collar, zipper closure, youthful design, lightweight, warm.

name: Textured slim fit shirt
description: Textured slim fit shirt in navy blue, suitable for multiple seasons throughout the year. The design fits snugly, creating a comfortable feeling for the wearer.

name: Crest jumper - Color-block Regular fit sweater
description: Round neck sweater with long sleeves, modern color mix knit design, Regular fit silhouette, made from premium synthetic wool that provides good warmth, soft texture, breathable, easy to mix with many outfits.

name: Echo Polo - Regular fit knitted polo shirt
description: Polo shirt with collar - Short sleeves - Lightly ribbed hem design - Regular fit style - Premium knit material - Soft, smooth and comfortable - Easy to combine with many outfits

name: Daily Metagent T-shirt
description: Round neck t-shirt - Short sleeve design - Plain pattern - REGULAR FIT style - Cotton material - Stretchy, elastic - Sweat absorption - Absolute shape retention - Easy to mix & match with many outfits

name: Regular CASUAL Supima T-shirt
description: Round neck t-shirt with short sleeves, solid pattern, Regular Fit style, made from Supima Cotton material, stretchy, elastic, sweat-absorbent, maintains perfect shape, easy to mix&match with many outfits.

name: Modal Slim Fit Polo Shirt with Contrasting Collar
description: Modal Slim Fit Polo Shirt with Contrasting Collar - Polo shirt with stand collar, short sleeves, regular length, solid pattern, color mixing at collar and sleeve cuffs, Slim fit style, material composition: 58% Cotton, 39% Modal, 3% Spandex, elastic stretch, sweat-absorbent, breathable, skin-safe, effectively wrinkle-resistant, easy to mix&match with many outfits, suitable for work and casual wear.
